Table.Description:
Tiefling Clan Ambush
 - Ambush players, who accidentally wandered into their territory
 - aim to take them prisoner and get questions answered
 - one wants them keps alive, another wants them executed just in case

The Feykiller Heresy, aka The Cult of Geni
 - If in Winter Wode, actively patrolling for expeditioners, will attack players on sight
 - If in Summer Wode, got lost, and may or may not attack depending on situation
Imperial Loyalist (Ex. Deserted in despair at collapse, got lost in Wode and doesn't know about current events, hail mary attempt at finding something to help empire, etc.)
Remains of a soldier of the Prophecy Wars with clue to interesting lore (ex. book that speaks of the Question of the Name, and the different way that Aspects were once viewed)
